mapper.select: SELECT CODE , GRP_CODE , CODE_NM , REF_CODE1 , REF_CODE2 , REF_CODE3 , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM code
SELECT SEQ , TYPE , NAME , SEX , BIRTH , PHONE , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS , REG_DATE , CNF_YN , LEAVE_YN FROM user
SELECT SEQ , TYPE , NAME , SEX , BIRTH , PHONE , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS , REG_DATE , CNF_YN , LEAVE_YN FROM user WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
